reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Strengthening of CSO Network on Mangrove Conservation in Indonesia

description.narrative: This project assists Siemenpuu-Kansalaisliikkeiden yhteistyösäätiö sr partners in Indonesia concerning the project management, and it monitors the projects together with Siemenpuu-Kansalaisliikkeiden yhteistyösäätiö sr programme coordinator and Ind onesia working group. Additionally, communication between project partners, Siemenpuu-Kansalaisliikkeiden yhteistyösäätiö sr and Advisory Group of Indonesia will be enhanced i.a. through visits, electronic media communication, other communication and a partner meeting that will be hold in October-November 2017. In addition, on this project we’ll make report that will increase awareness about situation of the seagrass and the influencing factors. The results of the report will be informed also in Finla nd. This project will increase administrative capacity of the partner’s, increase knowledge and communication of the particular current themes (peat swamp forests, mangroves, indigenous people, and community based conservation) and it also improves the a bility of Siemenpuu-Kansalaisliikkeiden yhteistyösäätiö sr to follow progress and results of the program partners. Partner meeting will be hold either in Pekanbaru, Riau or Bogori, Java. Members from all partner organizations, Advisory Group and Siemen puu-Kansalaisliikkeiden yhteistyösäätiö sr will be invited for the meeting. www.kaoemtelapak.org
